SELECT oi.order_item_id AS orderItemId, oi.order_id AS orderId, o.order_code AS orderCode, o.ship_recipient AS shipRecipient, o.ship_phone AS shipPhone, CONCAT(o.ship_postcode, ' ', o.ship_line1, ' ', o.ship_line2) AS shipAddress, o.note AS note, o.created_at AS orderDate, oi.tracking_no AS trackingNo, oi.carrier_name AS carrierName, oi.status AS status, (SELECT p2.name FROM order_item oi2 JOIN product p2 ON oi2.product_id = p2.product_id WHERE oi2.order_id = oi.order_id LIMIT 1) AS representProductName, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(p3.name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM order_item oi3 JOIN product p3 ON oi3.product_id = p3.product_id WHERE oi3.order_id = oi.order_id) AS allProductNames, CASE WHEN oi.status IN ('SHIPPING','DELIVERED','COLLECTING','EXCHANGE SHIPPING') THEN oi.status ELSE 'DELIVERED' END AS displayStatus FROM order_item oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id
oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND oi.status NOT IN ('PAID','PREPARING','CANCELLED')
AND o.created_at >= #{startDate}
AND o.created_at <= #{endDate}
AND oi.status = 'SHIPPING'
AND ( oi.status = 'DELIVERED' OR oi.status NOT IN ('PAID','PREPARING','CANCELLED','SHIPPING','COLLECTING','EXCHANGE SHIPPING') )
AND oi.status = 'COLLECTING'
AND oi.status = 'EXCHANGE SHIPPING'
AND o.ship_recipient LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND ( (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(p3.name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM order_item oi3 JOIN product p3 ON oi3.product_id = p3.product_id WHERE oi3.order_id = oi.order_id) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
AND oi.tracking_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
GROUP BY oi.order_id, oi.status ORDER BY oi.order_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT oi.order_id, oi.status FROM order_item oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id
oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND oi.status NOT IN ('PAID','PREPARING','CANCELLED')
AND o.created_at >= #{startDate}
AND o.created_at <= #{endDate}
AND oi.status = 'SHIPPING'
AND ( oi.status = 'DELIVERED' OR oi.status NOT IN ('PAID','PREPARING','CANCELLED','SHIPPING','COLLECTING','EXCHANGE SHIPPING') )
AND oi.status = 'COLLECTING'
AND oi.status = 'EXCHANGE SHIPPING'
AND o.ship_recipient LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND ( (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(p3.name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM order_item oi3 JOIN product p3 ON oi3.product_id = p3.product_id WHERE oi3.order_id = oi.order_id) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
AND oi.tracking_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
GROUP BY oi.order_id, oi.status ) AS countTable

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount), 0) AS salesToday, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS productCountToday FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND DATE(o.created_at) = CURDATE() AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount), 0) AS salesYesterday, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS productCountYesterday FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND DATE(o.created_at) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount), 0) AS salesWeek, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS productCountWeek FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND YEARWEEK(o.created_at, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT DATE(o.created_at) AS orderDate, COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount), 0) AS dailySales FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND o.created_at >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED' GROUP BY DATE(o.created_at) ORDER BY orderDate ASC

SELECT MONTH(o.created_at) AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(o.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN (oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount) ELSE 0 END) AS thisYear, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(o.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE()) - 1 THEN (oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount) ELSE 0 END) AS lastYear FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.orders_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND YEAR(o.created_at) IN (YEAR(CURDATE()), YEAR(CURDATE()) - 1) AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED' GROUP BY MONTH(o.created_at) ORDER BY month

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount),0) FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON o.orders_id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND YEAR(o.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(o.created_at) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(oi.line_subtotal - oi.discount),0) FROM order_item oi JOIN orders o ON o.orders_id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.brand_id = #{brandId} AND YEAR(o.created_at) = YEAR(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND MONTH(o.created_at) = MONTH(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND oi.status = 'CONFIRMED'
